member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.RadBulletGraph.QualitativeRanges
member.summary: Gets the collection that contains the qualitative ranges of the bullet graph. New ranges can be added and old ones can be removed. There must be two ranges at minimum and no more than 5. Otherwise an exception is thrown.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.RadBulletGraph.FeaturedMeasureAlternativeTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the template that determines the look of the alternative featured measure. The alternative featured measure is visible when the StartValue of RadBulletGraph is non-zero.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.RadBulletGraph.ComparativeMeasureTemplate

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.RadBulletGraph.AdditionalComparativeMeasures
member.summary: Gets a collection that contains any additional comparative measure. All operations on this collection are supported.

member.summary: This class converts 0 to its Visibility property value and non-zero to the opposite of its Visibility property value.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.BulletGraph.ValueToVisibilityConverter.Visibility
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that is returned if the value to be converted is 0. If the value to be converted is non-zero the opposite of this property is returned.

member.name: T:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.BarIndicatorSegment
member.summary: This class represents a segment in a segmented bar indicator. A segment can have a distinctive color, length and thickness.

member.name: F:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.BarIndicatorSegment.LengthProperty
member.summary: Identifies the property.

member.name: F:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.BarIndicatorSegment.ThicknessProperty
member.summary: Identifies the property.

member.name: F:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.BarIndicatorSegment.StrokeProperty
member.summary: Identifies the property.

member.name: M:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.BarIndicatorSegment.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.BarIndicatorSegment.ApplyTemplateCore
member.summary: Initializes the template parts of the control (see the TemplatePart attributes for more information).

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.BarIndicatorSegment.Length
member.summary: Gets or sets the length of the current segment.
member.remarks: The length does not need to be an absolute value. Internally a ratio is calculated that determines the actual length of each segment, relative to the actual value range of the owning instance. For example if a segmented indicator has three segments of length 1, they will be of evenly placed over the available indicator space. This property is somewhat similar to the relative size of the Grid panel's columns and rows.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.BarIndicatorSegment.Stroke
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of the segment.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.BarIndicatorSegment.Thickness
member.summary: Gets or sets the thickness of the segment.

member.name: T:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.CalculateAngleContext
member.summary: Contains data to calculate an angle based on a value.

member.name: T:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.GaugeColorValueRange
member.summary: This class represents a color that should be used only in visual elements that are between the min and max values.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.GaugeColorValueRange.Color
member.summary: The color of this particular rage.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.GaugeColorValueRange.MinValue
member.summary: The bottom limit of the range.

member.summary: The top limit of the range.

member.summary: This converter can be used to fill visual elements in the ticks and labels with a color that depends on the value of the tick or label.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the GaugeValueToBrushConverter class.

member.summary: Gets a list of GaugeColorToValueRanges.

member.summary: Gets or sets the default color of the converter.
member.remarks: If a value is passed that is not in the ranges list the default color will be returned.

member.name: T:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.GaugeValueToStringConverter
member.summary: Converts a value to a string and vice versa providing a Precision property to control the floating point precision of the converted value.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.GaugeValueToStringConverter.Precision
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of digits to be displayed after the decimal sign. This property is used only when converting a value to string, not vice versa.

member.summary: This class represents and indicator in the form of an arrow with a circular tail.

member.name: T:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.NeedleGaugeIndicator
member.summary: Represents a base class for needle indicators. For example and arrow or some other thin and pointy indicator. This class provides a rotation render transform.

member.name: T:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.RadialGaugeIndicator
member.summary: This is a base class for the radial indicators. It keeps a cache of the attached properties of the radial range. It defines neither visualization nor behavior so it is marked abstract.

member.name: T:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.BarGaugeIndicator
member.summary: A base class for bar indicators. A bar has a thickness and a brush that defines its color.

member.name: T:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.GaugeIndicator
member.summary: This is the base class of the gauge indicators. It is abstract because more concrete types must implement the arrange logic. Every indicator knows how to arrange itself in its range container.

member.summary: This method defines how a particular indicator will arrange itself in the parent range.

member.summary: A virtual method that is called when the value of this indicator changes.

member.summary: A virtual method that is called when the start value of this indicator changes.

member.summary: A virtual method that is called when the Owner of this indicator changes.

member.name: M:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.GaugeIndicator.UpdateOverride(Windows.Foundation.Size)
member.summary: This is a virtual method that resets the state of the indicator. The parent range is responsible to (indirectly) call this method when a property of importance changes.
member.param: A size which can be used by the update logic.
member.remarks: The linear range for example triggers the UpdateOverride() method of its indicators when its Orientation property changes.

member.name: M:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.GaugeIndicator.MeasureOverride(Windows.Foundation.Size)
member.summary: Called in the measure layout pass to determine the desired size.
member.param: The available size that was given by the layout system.
member.returns: Returns the desired size of the indicator.

member.name: E:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.GaugeIndicator.ValueChanged
member.summary: This event fires after the Value property changes. The event arguments contain the new as well as the old value.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.GaugeIndicator.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the value of this indicator.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.GaugeIndicator.StartValue
member.summary: Determines from where in the value range does the indicator start. By default every indicator starts at 0. The Value and StartValue properties do the exact same thing in the MarkerGaugeIndicator since it is always on a single point in the range.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.GaugeIndicator.Owner
member.summary: Gets the owner range of this indicator.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.GaugeIndicator.IsAnimated
member.summary: Gets or sets the IsAnimated property value. This property enables and disables the animated transition between values.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.GaugeIndicator.AnimationDuration
member.summary: Gets or sets the duration of the animation when IsAnimated is true.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.GaugeIndicator.AnimationEasing
member.summary: Gets or sets the easing of the animation when IsAnimated is true.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.GaugeIndicator.MeasureCallback
member.summary: Callback for testing purposes.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.GaugeIndicator.ArrangeCallback
member.summary: Callback for testing purposes.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.GaugeIndicator.ActualValue
member.summary: Gets the actual value of the indicator. Inheritors must use this property for their calculations, not the Value property.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.GaugeIndicator.MinMaxValueDifference
member.summary: Gets the difference between the min and max value of the parent range.

member.name: T:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.GaugePanel
member.summary: Base class for the gauge ranges. Defines a value range (min and max value), tick and label steps and templates for the ticks and labels. The class is abstract because the layout of the ticks and labels are defined in concrete types, for example the radial and linear ranges.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.RadialGaugePanel.CreateRotatedPoint(System.Double,System.Double,Windows.Foundation.Point,System.Double)
member.summary: Creates a point rotated angle radians around the center. The point will be radius * radiusScale away from the center.
member.param: Determines how much the resulting point will be rotated.
The radius of the circle over which to rotate the point.
The center of rotation.
A scale factor that the radius will be multiplied by.
member.returns: Returns a point rotated according to the parameters.

member.name: M:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.RadialGaugePanel.ConvertDegreesToRadians(System.Double)
member.summary: Converts the provided value in degrees to radians.
member.param: The angle in degrees to convert.
member.returns: Returns the provided value in degrees converted to radians.

member.summary: Calculates and angle in degrees based on a value, a value range, an angle range and a sweep direction.
member.param: A context that contains the value to be converted to an angle.
member.returns: Returns an angle in radians that corresponds to the provided value in the context.

member.name: M:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.RadGauge.MapLogicalToPhysicalValue(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Converts a logical value from a value range to some kind of physical value in another range.
member.param: The value to be converted.
The difference of the min and max values of the expected metric's range.
The difference between the min and max values.
member.returns: Returns a physical value that corresponds to the logical value in the physical value's respective range.
member.remarks: The other physical value can be an angle in the radial range and a distance in the linear range. For example a value in the min/max value range can be converted to an angle in min/max angle range or to a distance in the min/max distance range.

member.name: M:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.RadGauge.ApplyTemplateCore
member.summary: Resolves the control's template parts.

member.name: M:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.RadGauge.OnTemplateApplied
member.summary: Occurs when the method has been called and the template is already successfully applied.

member.name: M:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.RadGauge.UnapplyTemplateCore
member.summary: Unapplies the current control template. Occurs when a template has already been applied and a new one is applied.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.RadGauge.Indicators
member.summary: Gets a collection that holds the indicators in this range.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.RadGauge.MinValue
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum value that this range can represent.
member.remarks: The indicators can not point to a value that is less than MinValue.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.RadGauge.MaxValue
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum value that this range represent.
member.remarks: The indicators can not point to a value that is larger than MaxValue.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.RadGauge.TickStep
member.summary: Gets or sets the tick step.
member.remarks: The tick step is used to determine how the range ticks are spread over the value range. In other words, it determines how many ticks will be created.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.RadGauge.LabelStep
member.summary: Gets or sets the label step.
member.remarks: This step used to determine how the range labels will be spread over the value range.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.RadGauge.MiddleTickStep
member.summary: Gets or sets a step that is used to determine which ticks will be middle ticks.
member.remarks: This step is used on top of the number of created ticks, not the value range. Middle ticks will use the middle tick template.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.RadGauge.MajorTickStep
member.summary: Gets or sets a step that is used to determine which ticks will be major ticks.
member.remarks: This step is used on top of the number of created ticks, not the value range. Major ticks will use the major tick template.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.RadGauge.TickTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the template for the minor ticks.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.RadGauge.MiddleTickTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the template for the middle ticks.
member.remarks: If this is null, the minor template will be used instead.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.RadGauge.MajorTickTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the template for the major ticks.
member.remarks: If this is null, the minor template will be used instead.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.RadGauge.LabelTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the template that will represent the labels.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.RadGauge.IndicatorsZIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets the z-index for the gauge indicators that belong to this instance.
member.value: The default value is -1 (i.e. indicators are rendered below ticks and labels).

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.RadGauge.GaugeType
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of this range. It can be Radial or Linear.

member.name: T:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.RadLinearGauge
member.summary: Represents a Gauge that arranges its ticks, labels and indicators in a circle.

member.name: F:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.RadLinearGauge.OrientationProperty
member.summary: Identifies the Orientation property.

member.name: F:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.RadLinearGauge.IndicatorOffsetProperty
member.summary: Identifies the IndicatorOffset property.

member.name: F:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.RadLinearGauge.LabelOffsetProperty
member.summary: Identifies the LabelOffset property.

member.name: M:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.RadLinearGauge.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.RadLinearGauge.SetIndicatorOffset(Windows.UI.Xaml.DependencyObject,System.Double)
member.summary: Sets the IndicatorOffset attached property to the provided indicator.
member.param: The indicator for which to set the offset.
The offset of the indicator.
member.remarks: Setting IndicatorOffset to 0 in horizontal mode will move the indicators to the top edge of the range. Setting it to 2 on the other hand will move them to the bottom. In essence this is a factor by which the position of the indicators will be multiplied by.

member.name: M:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.RadLinearGauge.GetIndicatorOffset(Windows.UI.Xaml.DependencyObject)
member.summary: Gets the IndicatorOffset of the provided indicator.
member.param: The indicator from which the offset will be obtained.
member.returns: Returns the offset the provided indicator.

member.name: M:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.RadLinearGauge.GetOrientation(Windows.UI.Xaml.DependencyObject)
member.summary: Gets the Orientation value for the provided indicator.

member.name: M:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.RadLinearGauge.SetOrientation(Windows.UI.Xaml.DependencyObject,Windows.UI.Xaml.Controls.Orientation)
member.summary: Sets the specified Orientation value to the provided indicator.

member.name: M:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.RadLinearGauge.OnTemplateApplied
member.summary: Occurs when the method has been called and the template is already successfully applied.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.RadLinearGauge.LabelOffset
member.summary: Gets or sets an offset that is used to nudge the labels to the right or left (top/bottom if Orientation is horizontal) of the ticks.
member.remarks: Setting LabelOffset to 0 in horizontal mode will move the labels to the top edge of the range. Setting it to 2 on the other hand will move them to the bottom. In essence this is a factor by which the position of the labels will be multiplied by.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.RadLinearGauge.GaugeType
member.summary: Gets the type of this range. For this type it is always Linear.

member.name: T:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.RadRadialGauge
member.summary: Represents a Gauge that arranges its ticks, labels and indicators in a circle.

member.name: F:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.RadRadialGauge.MaxAngleProperty
member.summary: Identifies the MaxAngle attached property.

member.name: F:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.RadRadialGauge.MinAngleProperty
member.summary: Identifies the MinAngle attached property.

member.name: F:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.RadRadialGauge.IndicatorRadiusScaleProperty
member.summary: Identifies the IndicatorRadiusScale attached property.

member.summary: Identifies the TickRadiusScale property.

member.name: F:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.RadRadialGauge.LabelRadiusScaleProperty
member.summary: Identifies the LabelRadiusScale property.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.RadRadialGauge.GetIndicatorRadiusScale(Windows.UI.Xaml.DependencyObject)
member.summary: Gets the IndicatorRadiusScale attached property.
member.param: The indicator for which to obtain the IndicatorRadiusScale.
member.returns: Returns the IndicatorRadiusScale of the provided indicator.

member.name: M:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.RadRadialGauge.SetIndicatorRadiusScale(Windows.UI.Xaml.DependencyObject,System.Double)
member.summary: Sets the IndicatorRadiusScale attached property.
member.param: The indicator on which to set the IndicatorRadiusScale property.
The IndicatorRadiusScale value which will be set on the indicator.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.RadRadialGauge.TickRadiusScale
member.summary: Gets or sets a scale factor that will be multiplied by the radius of this range in order to position the ticks.
member.remarks: Setting this property to 1 will cause the ticks to be placed as far away from the center as possible. Setting it to 0 will cause all ticks to be placed at the center. The radius of the range is half the value of the minimum between the width and height of the layout slot.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.RadRadialGauge.LabelRadiusScale
member.summary: Gets or sets a scale factor that will be multiplied by the radius of this range in order to position the labels.
member.remarks: Setting this property to 1 will cause the labels to be placed as far away from the center as possible. Setting it to 0 will cause all labels to be placed at the center. The radius of the range is half the value of the minimum between the width and height of the layout slot.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.RadRadialGauge.MaxAngle
member.summary: Gets or sets the MaxAngle property.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.RadRadialGauge.MinAngle
member.summary: Gets or sets the MinAngle property.

member.name: T:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.Theming.PaletteInitializer
member.summary: Represents an empty type, used as an entry point in Telerik's Named Resources initialization.

member.name: M:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.DataVisualization.Theming.PaletteInitializer.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
